EmailTemplate.name: Late ASA Registration Years 4-7 Rosinka
EmailTemplate.subject: Late ASA Registration Years 4-7 Rosinka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
After a fun and exciting start to the ASA's this week we would like to alert you to a number of remaining places for your children:
TUESDAY BUDDING JOURNALISTS YEARS 4-7 = 7 places
TUESDAY ASTRONOMY YEARS 4-7 = 12 places
TUESDAY CHESS YEARS 4-7 = 10 places
TUESDAY HOMEWORK YEARS 4-7 = 10 places
TUESDAY IRISH DANCING YEARS 4-7 = 6 places
WEDNESDAY BOWLING YEARS 4-7 = 8 places
WEDNESDAY CHOIR YEARS 4-7 = 8 places
WEDNESDAY FELT CHRISTMAS TREE DECORATION YEARS 4-7 = 10 places
WEDNESDAY FOLK DANCE YEARS 4-7 = 10 places
WEDNESDAY FUN WITH ENGLISH YEARS 4-7 = 10 places
WEDNESDAY NATURE/OUTDOOR YEARS 4-7 = 10 places
If you would like to sign up for one of these ASA's please email Adam McAndrews directly at adam.mcandrews@internationalschool.ru and he will add your child/ren to the list on a strictly first come first served basis. Please note that only emails received up until 5pm Monday 29th September, will receive a place; subject to that ASAâ€™s availability. You will receive a confirmation email, confirming your child's place, by 6:30pm.
Best wishes,
Mr McAndrews ASA co-ordinator The International School of Moscow World Class Education
